item.title: 12.4.1 Update on device
item.description: Update on device # Device update history: To view device update history do the following: Click on Utilities > History > Update on device. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time to search. Number plate: Select a license plate to view the update history. IMEI: Enter the device IMEI or enter a character to search.

item.title: 12.4.3 SIM info history
item.description: SIM info history # SIM info history: To output a detailed report of all SIM activities with the device. To view SIM info history do the following: Click on Utilities > History > SIM info history. Search # Step 1: You can search by the following criteria: Date: Select the time to search. Device: Select a device to view history.
